query:
SELECT gl.*, l.nome as loja_nome, u.email as gestor_email
FROM gestor_lojas gl
LEFT JOIN lojas l ON gl.lojaId = l.id
LEFT JOIN users u ON gl.gestorId = u.id
WHERE u.email = 'mamorim@expressglass.pt';
command:

LEFT JOIN lojas l ON gl.lojaId = l.id
LEFT JOIN users u ON gl.gestorId = u.id
WHERE u.email = 'mamorim@expressglass.pt';
